Hospital.Controllers

Class PatientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Controllers.PatientController

  • @SystemAPI
public class PatientController
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for patient-related actions that are handled by a nurse This controller enables the following usecases: Register patient: register the patient

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PatientController(WorldController wc, NurseController nc)
      Creates a patientController to register a new Patient.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String registerPatient(java.lang.String name)
      This creates a new Patient and adds it to the hospital.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatientController

        @SystemAPI
public PatientController(WorldController wc,
                           NurseController nc)
                  throws ArgumentIsNullException
        Creates a patientController to register a new Patient.
        Parameters:
        wc - The WorldController to add the patient to.
        nc - The NurseController that adds the patient.
        Throws:
        ArgumentIsNullException - wc or ac was null.

    • Method Detail

      • registerPatient

        @SystemAPI
public java.lang.String registerPatient(java.lang.String name)
                                 throws NotLoggedInException,
                                        SchedulableAlreadyExistsException,
                                        InvalidArgumentException
        This creates a new Patient and adds it to the hospital.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the patient
        Returns:
        a description of the new patient
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.
        SchedulableAlreadyExistsException - If a patient with the same name already existed.
        InvalidArgumentException - if name was null
